content: add volume to your neckline while keeping cozy with this lush crochet scarf featured in lively shades of red heart super saver parrot stripes you ll learn single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet chain crochet fringe and more whether for yourself or making a gift this fashionable fringy shawl is a great way to jazz up your outfit materials red heart® super saver® 141 g/5 oz 236 yds/215 m parrot stripe 4968 3 balls or 700 yds/637 m measurements approx 60 152 5 cm wide x 30 76 cm deep excluding fringe
